hadiths.text: Umm Al-Fadl narrated:"Allah's Messenger came out to us with his head bandaged from his illness. He prayed Maghrib, reciting (Surat) Al-Mursalat." [She said:] "He did not pray it again until he met Allah the Might and Sublime

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْقِرَاءَةِ فِي الْمَغْرِبِ
chapter.eng-name: [What Has Been Related About] The Recitation For Maghrib
